body_html: @albanD thanks! I was trying to use resize_ because I was emulating how the internals of torch.sum(a, b, dim, out=c) works (c gets resize_ed into the correct shape, which can lead to some weird things). But thank you for pointing out that view is the correct way to do it in this case

body: @albanD thanks! I was trying to use `resize_` because I was emulating how the internals of `torch.sum(a, b, dim, out=c)` works (`c` gets `resize_`ed into the correct shape, which can lead to some weird things). But thank you for pointing out that `view` is the correct way to do it in this case
